short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your wellbeing with inspirational tips and reminders every time you open a new tab on Google Chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
2020 was a year full of surprises that no one asked for. We hope that belongs to the past. Right now, as we move forward, we all need a little extra positivity in our lives.

Little Gifts For The Mind is a Google Chrome Extension that works as a reminder to look after yourself and those around you. In the spirit of our mission of using digital to make the analog world better, this browser extension gives you an inspirational lift every time you open a new tab on Google Chrome. We hope these small acts will have a big impact on your wellbeing, with useful tips you can easily apply to make every day a bit brighter. 

Install Little Gifts For The Mind now to receive a well-deserved, powerful little boost for your mental health. And don't forget to share it with family, friends and colleagues to help spread the seasonal goodwill.


Features:
• Inspirational quotes - randomly selected from a bank of 50 quote options to greet the user every time they open a new tab.  

• The quote is presented on a background which also is randomly generated from a bank of 4 background options. 

• Each tab features a Google search bar. The search bar submits the search query to Google or opens a new site if a valid URL is detected.

• At the bottom left of the tab the user will see a clickable logo. Once clicked, a small expandable/collapsible pop up will open to reveal a one paragraph description and a 'copy URL' button. This 'copy URL' button will simply copy the unique URL form the Chrome Web Store where the user can find the browser extension, share on their social and download.
